Feb. 8, 1998 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-fourth-section
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including March From Pennine Moors. 12 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Lynda Goswell, Flugel, Raunds
1st Prize: £300.00 (Cecil Bowden Memorial trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Milton Keynes Borough trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Belam Challenge trophy)
March 7, 2011, 5:15 p.m. March 7, 2011, 5:17 p.m.
1 Audley Brass Kevin Birch
2 Stonesfield Silver Band Terry Brotherhood
3 Raunds Temperance Band John Fletcher
4 Suffolk Phoenix Brass Roland Morris
5 Bradwell Silver Band Brian Keech
6 Watford Stephen Foggin
